meanings.sent1: The rock's immutability made it a reliable landmark.
meanings.sent2: The laws of physics demonstrate the concept of immutability.
meanings.sent3: The immutability of the recipe ensured consistent flavors every time.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as immutability as the North Star.
meanings.sent5: The immutability of the ancient ruins fascinated the archaeologists.

meanings.sent1: The terms of the contract were set in immutability.
meanings.sent2: The password's immutability provided a high level of security.
meanings.sent3: The immutability of the decision left no room for negotiation.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty to the company was as immutability as a mountain.
